dict.string: en
BandMate
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
$(PRODUCT_NAME)
APPL
$(MARKETING_VERSION)
$(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION)
BandMate app needs access to your camera to capture vehicle photos for uploads.
BandMate app needs access to your face to provide face recognition services.
BandMate app uses your location to provide location-based features like nearby places and distance calculations, even when the app is in use.
BandMate app uses your location to provide accurate services and notifications related to your trips and vehicles.
BandMate app needs access to your location to provide location-based services, calculate distances, and help you find nearby places.
BandMate app saves photos to your library when needed.
BandMate app needs access to your photo library to choose existing images.
BandMate app needs access to your music library to provide music-related features and enhance your driving experience.
BandMate app needs access to microphone for voice commands and audio features.
BandMate app needs access to contacts to share trip information with your friends and family.
BandMate app needs access to calendar to schedule and manage your trips.
BandMate app needs access to reminders to set trip reminders and notifications.
BandMate app uses Bluetooth to connect with vehicle devices and provide enhanced features.
BandMate app uses Bluetooth to communicate with nearby devices and vehicles.
BandMate app uses motion data to detect driving patterns and provide trip analytics.
LaunchScreen
